title: Installed IDA 7.0 Freeware -- no debugger, is that installed separately? [duplicate]
content:
After setting up a home lab and installing the latest IDA 7.0 freeware, I don't see the debugger submenu I was expecting -- I've only used it in an academic setting before and it came pre-configured for me.

Is the debugger a separate add-in that I need to install/enable?

answers_data.content:
The freeware version comes without such features as a debugger.
According to the freeware page on Hex-Rays site:

edit:

IDA freeware is now released with the debugging feature available since March 2019. The above quote no longer includes "debugging" on the free download page linked above.
